Event Finder application helps to locate nearby events and provides information regarding events.You can easily register for the event and donate for it
Donate to make a difference Submit First Name Surname Register Email Mobile No. Donate in Hudds 2020 charity ball ,you can donate through ways , we have provided our account number for donations or you can register you card and by from the app Donate Account Number 1928347884 Enter Amount in Pounds Please Enter name Enter a valid mobile number Please Enter a valid Email Version 1.001 Donate> Presented by Khan Studios Event Entry Pass> Hudds Charity Ball 2020> University of Huddersfield> 1ST JUNE> Oastler Building> 12:00 PM> Take a ScreenShot> Khan Studios Register for the Event > About the app>
